title: IT Crowd Article
body: Hello, IT. Have you tried turning it off and on again?See the driver hooks a function by patching the system call table, so its not safe to unload it unless another thread's about to jump in there and do its stuff, and you don't want to end up in the middle of invalid memory!
author: itcrowd
